00043 
00047 struct PxParticleBaseFlag
00048 {
00049     enum Enum
00050     {
00060         eCOLLISION_TWOWAY                   = (1<<0),
00061 
00070         eCOLLISION_WITH_DYNAMIC_ACTORS      = (1<<1),
00071 
00075         eENABLED                            = (1<<2),
00076 
00082         ePROJECT_TO_PLANE                   = (1<<3),
00083 
00091         ePER_PARTICLE_REST_OFFSET           = (1<<4),
00092 
00100         ePER_PARTICLE_COLLISION_CACHE_HINT  = (1<<5),
00101 
00110         eGPU                                = (1<<6),
00111     };
00112 };
00113 
00114
